title: Microsoft Windows XP Home Edition SP2
description:
-----------------------------------------
> Microsoft Windows XP Home Edition SP2 <
-----------------------------------------
this version is official MS software and is fully updatable. 


INSTRUCTIONS
------------
>open serial note pad, jot down the serial onto paper.
>burn .daa file using PowerISO to disk at slowest speed possible.
>reboot, then enter the included serial when asked.
>proceed installation as prompted on screen.
>activate windows by clicking on the pop up that says "30 day to activate", follow the logical choices that it gives you.

you now have a full version of windows XP that automatically updates.


>Download Drivers for your PC from the Manufacturers official website if you don't have access to a driver disk specifically for your make of computer.

>Please SEED as it will make it a more pleasant experience for others that wont to download this torrent.  
>Please add comment after download so people have confirmation that it works.


THANK YOU to all you downloaders out there, SEED for at least the time that it took you to download this torrent your self as it will keep this torrent going strong allowing others to enjoy one of the most reliable Operating Systems out there.


Please SEED!!!!...........Add Comment!!!!....Thank YOU!!!!
